(Revelation 1:8;  22:13.) The Alpha and Omega.--When the students of prophecy shall set their hearts to know the truths of Revelation, they will realize what an importance is attached to this search. Christ Jesus is the Alpha and the Omega, the Genesis of the Old Testament, and the Revelation of the New. Both meet together in Christ. Adam and God are reconciled by the obedience of the second Adam, who accomplished the work of overcoming the 
                                                                           1093
temptations of Satan and redeeming Adam's disgraceful failure and fall.
